strength_details: Modern data stack with Snowflake data warehouse and Talend ETL platform
Established enterprise company (IBM) with stable work environment
Clear data engineering focus with both batch and real-time processing
concern_details: No salary or compensation information disclosed
No visa sponsorship mentioned - likely requires existing work authorization in India
No career growth, learning opportunities, or development paths mentioned
Onsite role in Hyderabad with no remote flexibility mentioned
best_fit_details: Mid-level data engineers with 3-6 years experience in ETL and data warehousing
Engineers with Snowflake and Talend experience seeking stable enterprise role
Candidates already based in Hyderabad or willing to relocate
probe_details: Ask about salary range, benefits, and total compensation package
Understand team structure, size, and reporting relationships
Clarify work hours, overtime expectations, and consulting schedule demands
Discuss remote work policy and flexibility options
leverage_details: Being already located in Hyderabad eliminates relocation costs
Strong Snowflake and Talend experience is directly aligned with requirements
summary.overall_assessment: Solid data engineering role at established enterprise company with modern tech stack. Good for mid-level engineers seeking stable environment and hands-on experience with Snowflake/Talend. Main trade-offs are lack of disclosed compensation, onsite requirement, and limited growth opportunities mentioned.
